title: Shanny's basic beef Stroganoff
ingredients: ['675g beef fillet (or rump), cut into strips (roughly 5x1cm thick)', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '8 - 10 button mushrooms, cut into 1/2cm thick slices', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '300ml soured cream', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped parsley', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper']
